briefTitle: Study of Modified Recombinant Factor VIII (OBI-1) in Subjects With Acquired Hemophilia A
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of B-Domain Deleted Recombinant Porcine Factor VIII (OBI-1) in the Treatment of Acquired Hemophilia A Due to Factor VIII Inhibitory Auto-antibodies
summary: This study is to test whether the study drug (OBI-1) is safe and effective for the treatment of serious bleeding episodes in people with acquired hemophilia A.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Serious Bleeding Episodes Responsive to OBI-1
